full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 562 Filed 12/17/21 Page 73 of 82
1 Instruction No. 54: Persons Not on Trial
2 You may not draw any inference, favorable or unfavorable, towards the Government or
3 the defendant on trial from the fact that any person in addition to the defendant is not on trial here. You also may not speculate as to the reasons why other persons are not on trial. Those
5 matters are wholly outside your concern and have no bearing on your function as jurors in
6 deciding the case before you.
72
DOJ-OGR-00008529
